name: Dividing Echo
description:
A turn-based RPG game.

In the continent of Aivrath, where two large rivaling empires are at the brink of war, the outcome of their first battle will indefinitely set the tone for the war, and reveal which empire is most advantageous...

While the Empire of Orane has teamed up with some friends in the Outer Territories, including the Xulu Tribe, and Verna Empire only have themselves to depend on.

Who will the first victory go to?

         

Artists

Alicia Zhen

Michael Remorin

  

Programmers

Randy Le

Sheel Kulkarni

Yuanzheng Ji

Laihong Xu

      

Sound Designer

Yicheng Xiang
